entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 1:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -22.8°C
Wind: E 80 km/h gust 98 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
